title: Massive loss streak
body: hey guys/girls in the last 3 days i have gone onto a massive loosing streak of over 7 soloq games, 1 ranked team game, 3 normal games. throughout the 3 days i have only won about 1-2 games in NORMAL'S. I dont know what is happening at first i thought it might have been me cause of tilt but in all my games i have been going positive and trying my hardest to carry but it just seems like my team dont have the skill level in the mid-late game. If anyone has any tips on how to get out of this losing streak please comment.

About 3 weeks ago I lost 8 in a row to fall from gold 4 to gold 5 with 0lp. I was playing jungle in all games which is not my main as I wanted to learn different champions. Tbh i didn't even care about losing. After the losses I won 14 of the next 17 games, which included winning 10 in a row immediately after the losses. Went back to top, which I main and now am in promos for gold 1.

The main thing is to not let losses get to you. When I lost the 8 I had some poor teams but I also played poorly. When I won the 10 I played roles familiar to me and made good calls.

Another thing to bear in mind is to stop playing when you're on tilt or tired. You will just end up making bad calls and losing.
I once went on a 6 loss streak in **ranked **games. When you're on a losing streak and you feel like giving up, just remember, someone out there has it worse.
Take a break from league entirely for a couple hours or a day. Play some steam game you Haven't finished. More than likely the losses are making you frustrated causing you to play poorly.
